text: Mugihe twagira amasezerano n’uruvyaro rwa bene israeri yuko batazosenga uwariwe wese atari Imana yonyene gusa, kandi mukabagirira ineza abavyeyi banyu, hamwe n’abagenzi banyu, hamwe n’impfuvyi n’aboro, kandi mukavugana n’abantu mumvugo nziza kandi mugahagarika n’amasengesho n’ugutanga imperezwa hanyuma nibahindukira dukuyemwo abantu bakeyi gusa muri mwebwe, namwe mutavyitaye ho
